OrgName: Residential Funding Company, LLC and its controlled U.S. Subsidiaries
activities:
Assessing performance or suitability for employment, analyzing and reporting statistics of the workforce, processing payroll and tax matters, administering the business, managing employment matters, assuring compliance with Company policy, taking surveys, administering insurance, benefit or compensation programs and other Company systems and reporting processes.
PLEASE NOTE: As a subsidiary of the General Motors Corporation family of companies, we have a separate self-certification under General Motors Corporation for the Processing of Business Personal Data as defined therein.
eucountries: France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, United Kingdom
